game.name: THE FANGS HUNTRESS
game.shortDescription: The Fangs Huntress is a retro-inspired first person shooter with a huge roster of monsters and bosses, with a fantastic array of weapons. The game puts you in the shoes of a demon hunter in search of the all-powerful vampire Vladislav!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Fangs Huntress is a retro-inspired first person shooter with a huge roster of monsters and bosses, with a fantastic array of weapons. The game puts you in the shoes of a demon hunter in search of the all-powerful vampire Vladislav!

reviewHighlights.text: What a cool little throwback. Not very stressful due to plentiful health. Great variety of enemies to blast. Very cool. Very impressed. Can't believe...
This is a boomer shooter made by a adult/lewd game publisher and developer and honestly it's amazing that it works so well. Nothing here to innovative...
